participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Playful and nurturing with a love for dogs and sports.
participant_1.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i have three dogs. i like to watch the olympics.

participant_2.name: Charlie
participant_2.personality: Curious and imaginative with a love for animals and sweets.
participant_2.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i am four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.
